articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Closing bell: Sensex ends day at over 65,400; Nifty at 19,435 - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In Asian markets, meanwhile, Seoul, Tokyo, Shanghai and Hong Kong ended in the negative territory.
articles.content: Benchmark equity indices bounced back sharply and ended in the positive territory on Monday, helped by fag-end buying in index heavyweights Reliance Industries and Infosys along with a firm beginning… [+1374 chars]
